abstract: The N.B.A. lockout keeps dragging on, and players are finding alternate ways to play either in All-Star events like one being staged by Allen Iverson in Las Vegas, or signing with overseas teams.
snippet: The N.B.A. lockout keeps dragging on, and players are finding alternate ways to play either in All-Star events like one being staged by Allen Iverson in Las Vegas, or signing with overseas teams.
lead_paragraph: With the N.B.A. lockout dragging on, players are looking at options, with some deciding to head overseas to play and others contemplating All-Star barnstorming tours.

headline.main: N.B.A. Players Finding Places to Play
